info.+content: Chise Hatori is 15-year-old orphan. She has no relatives, means, or hopes when a demonic sorcerer who can't become human buys her. He states that Chise will now be his apprentice and bride. (from manga)
#2: "Tsuki no Mō Hanbun" (The Moon is Already a Half Moon) by AIKI&AKINO from Bless4

title.+content: One today is worth two tomorrows.
The balance distinguishes not between gold and lead.
Talk of the devil, and he is sure to appear.
None so deaf as those who will not hear.
Lovers ever run before the clock.
Better to ask the way than go astray.
There is no place like home.
God's mill grinds slow but sure.
You can't make an omelet without breaking a few eggs.
As you sow, so shall you reap.
